lore: Granite Golems hate Magi and everything related to them. Even though they are quite loyal to their masters, it can be dangerous for a Mage to own one, as their instincts can provoke the occasional outburst that usually results in property damage. On the other hand, whenever a magical accident causes damage to a town, this creature always appears to help rebuild it.
menagerieDialog: (It's so still that you're not even sure it's still alive.)
(This creature has the best of intentions, but it always seems to be clumsily knocking things over.)
(Perhaps someday, you'll be able to take the time to teach it how to talk.)
(Its facial expressions are difficult to read. You can't help but think that it's judging you sometimes.)
name: Granite Golem
